subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Darryl Sutter is one of six brothers to play in the N.H.L. and four to coach in the league, but the only Sutter sibling with a championship ring earned behind the bench.
snippet: Darryl Sutter is one of six brothers to play in the N.H.L. and four to coach in the league, but the only Sutter sibling with a championship ring earned behind the bench.
